pages.text: The $(item)Athame$() is an essential tool to any witch. It can be used to gather special drops (such as heads) from mobs, and also has a lot of niche uses.$(br2)Being made out of $(l:bewitchment:introduction/silver)Silver$(), it is perfectly usable against $(l:bewitchment:creatures/vampire)Vampires$() and $(l:bewitchment:creatures/werewolf)Werewolves$() too.

By slaying a $(marked)humanoid$() with an Athame while holding a $(item)Glass Bottle$() in the offhand, one can collect $(item)Bottles of Blood$().$(br2)Athames are also used to start most $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)sacrificial rituals$().
